item.title: A Few of My Favorite R Packages
item.description: I just finished my second year in the PhD program, which has meant 2 years of writing a lot of R code. Though I’ve been using R longer than that, I’m always trying to improve my programming skills. Today, I wanted to share some useful R packages/functions that have made my life easier and changed the way I code. pacman for loading packages: This package contains an awesome function called p_load.
